ygData.msgSnippet: Jayde sits bolt upright and glares at him.  ROOKIES?  I ve been with this outfit for almost ten years! ... rookies ... be ... sparks, ... just ... wish ...

Jayde sits bolt upright and glares at him.  "ROOKIES?  I've been with 
this outfit for almost ten years!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: At least you don't get slagged. I've seen lots of 
rookies 
> saying the same things you say and getting scrapped at the first 
> occasion they get. The good thing is it separates those who should 
be 
> there from those who shouldn't.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > As the battle winds down, Jayde lays back on the table, looking 
> > listlessly at the ceiling.  "I really wish they'd stop leaving me 
> > behind.  I miss all the interesting stuff."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Yggdrasil: Yes! I would have enjoyed scrapping a few pred 
sparks, 
> > you 
> > > know...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > Jayde blinks and looks around.  "Computer, activate holo-
> > imaging.  
> > > > Zero in on the battle at Maximal HQ."
> > > > 
> > > > A large holo-field engulfs half the room, displaying the 
> > > > battlefield.  (It is to be noted that the Rogues, and not 
just 
> > > > Pumpskin, are on the Predacons' side.)  "Woohoo, I just love 
> > these 
> > > > big-screen models!" the tiny femme says enthusiastically, 
> hopping 
> > up 
> > > > on the table next to Yggdrasil to watch.  "Kinda makes you 
wish 
> > you 
> > > > were there."
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Yggdrasil got up in his small cell. He tried to see if any 
of 
> > his 
> > > > > captors were there.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Picking up Pumpskin's energy signature had made him think. 
He 
> > > > seemed 
> > > > > engaged in a battle, but somehow he seemed to be on the 
> > Predacon's 
> > > > > side.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Yggdrasil: Hey guys, how's the battle going?
